  • Make sure your email client is functioning normally.

aboutus.box1_content: Learn about various cryptocurrencies with live price updates and up to date information.
aboutus.box2_content:
Digital Assets (cryptocurrencies) allow for instantanious transfer across mediums, making sending and receiving much quicker
            than traditional money transfers.
aboutus.box3_content: Sistemkoin funds self growth through profitable Bithcoin and Ethereum mining.
aboutus.box4_content: All Sistemkoin assets are stored offline in cold wallets, ensuring maximum security.

PROFILE.DEVICEMANAGE_TEXT: These devices are currently allowed to access your account
PROFILE.ANTIPISHING_TEXT: By verifying your Anti-Phishing Code, you will be able to         prevent phishing attempts from fake Sistemkoin websites or email address
PROFILE.API_TEXT:
Creating an API private key provides access to markets and real-time trading services on Sistemkoin via a third-party site
                or application. View API documentations
PROFILE.DISCOUNT: Using SMK to pay for fees (25% Discount)
PROFILE.GOOGLEAUTH_TEXT: Used for withdrawals and security modifications
PROFILE.SMSAUTH_TEXT: Used for withdrawals and security modifications
PROFILE.EMAILAUTH_TEXT: Used for withdrawals and security modifications
PROFILE.WITHDRAWAL_TEXT:
Address Management allows you to save and write memos for each of your withdrawal addresses. The optional Whitelist
              function helps protect your funds by only allowing withdrawals to whitelisted addresses.

antiphishing.label: Anti-Phishing Code
antiphishing.text1:
Once you have successfully set your Anti-Phishing Code, all Sistemcoin emails that you receive
            will contain exact code.
antiphishing.text2: Do not disclose Password, Google Authentication codes and SMS to anyone, including Sistemkoin support
antiphishing.title: Set Anti-Phishing Code

coinofmonth.text1: You can select the candidates you would like to vote for below. Each registered user can vote for multiple candidates but will only be able to submit their full vote once. User will need to pay 0.1 SMK per candidate in their vote (i.e. 0.2 SMK will be deducted if 2 candidates are selected). The Final Multiple applied to your vote is based on your amount of SMK holdings.

contactus.text1: Please first check the official Sistemkoin FAQ to see if your question has already been answered:
contactus.text2: Still cannot find out what you’re looking for? Submit a request
contactus.title: Contact us

googleauth.text1: for security purpose no withdrawals are permitted for 24 hours after disable of Google Authentication
googleauth.title: Disable Google Authentication

level.list_text1: Trading fee are determined based on trading volume over a 30-day period (in BTC) and SMK balance.
level.list_text2: At 00.00AM (UTC) every day, your trading volume over the past 30-days period and your current SMK balance are evaluated. Your tier level are corresponding maker/taker fees are updated one hour later.
level.list_text3: Maker/taker fee discounts are in addition to existing trading fee discounts for SMK users.
level.text1: To upgrade to Gold, you will need to trade another
level.text2: BTC and increase your SMK balance by

CHANGEPASSWORD.NOTE1: for security puposes, withdrawals are disabled for 24 hours after disabling SMS authentication.
CHANGEPASSWORD.TITLE: Change Login Password

smsauth.text1:
Do not disclose Password, Google Authentication codes and SMS to anyone,
including Sistemkoin support.
smsauth.title: Enable SMS Authentication

ticket.text1:
You may upload upto 3 documents

Each file size should not exceed 5MB.

Supported formats jpg / jpeg / bmp / png / gif
ticket.title: Submit a Ticket

VERIFY_ID.TEXT8:
If you experience an unexpected interruption when uploading information during your application process, please
            try again after 20 minutes
VERIFY_ID.TEXT7: Your documents have been received, and are currently being reviewed.
VERIFY_ID.ENTERPRISETEXT: Contact Info > Company Info > Processing > Approval
VERIFY_ID.TEXT1: Notice: Only one type of identification is allowed per sistemkoin account
VERIFY_ID.TEXT2:
We have sent a confirmation email to your registered email address. admin@sistemkoin.com.
Please follow the instruction in the email to continue. Resend Email
VERIFY_ID.TEXT3:
If you haven’t received the email, please try the following:
  • Make sure the email address you provided is correct.
  • Check your spam or junk mail folders.
  • Add Sistemkoin to your email address whitelist.
  • Make sure your email client is functioning normally.
VERIFY_ID.TEXT4: Notice: Hold up a handwritten note with the phrase Sistemkoin and today's date below it
VERIFY_ID.TEXT5: Notice: Please upload first main page of your passport with your face picture
VERIFY_ID.TEXT6: Notice: Please upload front side of your driving license
VERIFY_ID.TEXT9: Notice: Please upload front side of your id card
VERIFY_ID.TITLE: Verify Your Identity

withdrawal.text1:
• Once you have submitted your withdrawal request, we will send a confirmation email. Please confirm through the provided confirmation link in the email
  • You can always track the progress of your withdrawal in the Transaction History
withdrawal.title: Withdrawal Request
